name: Wài pó's Cookbook
description:
Play as little Zoe in this casual adventure game on her grandparent's farm. Help them combine the right ingredients for recipes from Wài pó's cookbook!

Submission to Godot Wild Jam #43 ("Combine" theme).

Controls

  • move = WASD / Arrows / Left Stick
  • look = Mouse / Right Stick 
  • interact = E / Left Mouse Button / L Trigger
  • toggle running = Shift / R Trigger
  • jump = Space / A Button
  • pause = Escape / Start Button
